thread.title: UD men to play two 16-minute halves at Red and Blue game
thread.title_full: UD men to play two 16-minute halves at Red and Blue game

title: UD men to play two 16-minute halves at Red and Blue game
text:
Posted: 4:31 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19, 2015 UD men to play two 16-minute halves at Red and Blue game Related Staff Writer DAYTON — 
The Dayton men’s and women’s basketball teams will hold their annual Red and Blue scrimmages at UD Arena on Saturday. 
UD is offering free football tickets to that night’s 6 p.m. game against Butler at Welcome Stadium to anyone going to the scrimmage. 
Here is a schedule for Saturday’s scrimmages: 
1 p.m.: Doors open. 
2 p.m.: Women’s basketball introductions. 
2:05 p.m.: Women playing three eight-minute periods. 
2:45 p.m.: Men’s basketball players warm up on the floor. 
3:10 p.m.: Men’s basketball introductions. 
3:15-3:50 p.m.: Men’s basketball playing two 16-minute halves. 
4:05-4:50 p.m.: Autographs with men’s and women’s players on North Concourse. 
* Fans can bring one item to be autographed. 
* Team posters will be available for free. 
*Future Flyers Kids Club membership pick-up as well. 
* Flight Deck open 3-6 p.m. for fans. 
* Gates open 5 p.m. for football vs. Butler. More News
